question: Which of the following correctly describes autotrophic succession?
option1: In this succession initially green plants are more in number
option2: In this the succession is brought about by the living members of the particular community
option3: In this succession the habitation is created on a barren land
option4: This succession is brought about by the external forces
answer: In this succession initially green plants are more in number
explanation: Autotrophic succession is the one in which primarily green plants are much greater in quantity. This type of succession occurs in the area existing in the middle of a large continent because here the seeds of plants belonging to different seres reaches much faster.
